message: I'm being generous in the first round, but remember, inflation hurts us both!
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  This offer keeps more value for both of us in the long run.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than last round. We can still both get a decent share if we work together.
Alice, time is running out! This is a fair split that gives us both a good deal. Let's not lose more to inflation.
